#summary Muscles of Human Torso
[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [HumanMuscles] -> [HumanMusclesTorso]
----

This page is intended to list all muscles of biological human in the torso area.
Related findings are structured by other research themes.

  * *Transversospinales muscles*
   * *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interspinales_muscle Interspinales muscles]*; NERVELIST={[CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS], [01, T1 nerve], [12, T12 nerve], [LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS]}; ACTION={extension, flexion and rotation of vertebral column}
   * *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intertransversarii_muscle Intertransversarii muscle]*; NERVELIST={[CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS], [01, T1 nerve], [12, T12 nerve], [LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS]}; ACTION={lateral flexion of trunk}
   * *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multifidus_muscle Multifidus muscle]*; NERVELIST={[CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS], [THORACIC NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS], [LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS], [SACRAL AND COCCYGEAL NERVES - ROOTS]}; ACTION={stabilizes vertebrae in local movements of vertebral column}

(generated)

  * *Abdominal oblique muscle*
